name: Han's Adventure
description:
Han's Adventure is a 2D action platformer game with pixel art style.

Embark on an adventure in Han's world with the help of lovely animals.

Features:

-Play 4 different act in 4 different seasons
-40 levels
-Arena: Earn coins, unlock special upgrades that can't be purchased with coins and aim for the top in google play ranking
-More than 40 unique enemy types
-Unusual action with different enemy behavior
-Face the challenges of the underworld
-Empower your hero with different swords and choose your playing style
-Rest with platforms between action
-Avoid various traps
-Help the hero by controlling cute animals and overcome obstacles
-Feel your strength with improvements like movement speed, jumping power, frequency of damage, and health
-No boring with many more gameplay items; portals, underwater, cannonball, dangerous green areas, boosts
- Kendini asla sıkmayan ve tekrarlayan yenilikçi bir oyun.
24 farklı başarı ile maceranıza heyecan
katın - Gizli nadir ve özel paraları toplayın ve madeni paralarınızı artırın

Long Gameplay Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqHU6EkWhIA
